definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: the outside, sts., esp. in pl., spec. a street, never with sf. in sg., with [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc. [[ח֫וּחָה]], [[חֻ֫חָה]], pl. [[חוּחוֹת]], [[חֻחוֹת]], with sf. [[חוּחׂתָיו]] etc., Is 15:3 etc.;—
the outside, of a house, tent, city, camp, etc., oft. used, esp. with preps., to express the adv. idea of outside, abroad (Aram. syn., exc. in sense

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: as accus. after vb. of motion De 23:13 [[יׇחָא חוּץ]] to go forth outside (sc. a camp), v:De 23:14 (as adv. accus.) [[בְּשִׁבְתְּךָ]] [[חוּץ]] outside, [[הוֹחִיא הַחוּץ]] to bring forth outside (a house or chamber) Ju Jdg 19:25, 2Sa 13:18 cf. Ne 13:8, Ju Jdg 12:9 b [[בָּנוֹת הֵבִיא לְבָנׇיו מִן־הַחוּץ]] from outside, from abroad, 2Ki 4:3 [[שַׁאֲלִי־לָח כֵּלִים מִן־הַחוּץ]] from outside (opp. [[בַּבַּיִת]] v:2Ki 4:2); as genit. Le 18:9 [[מוֹלֶדֶת]] [[חוּץ]] one born abroad (i.e. by another father or mother, of a half-sister: opp. [[מוֹלֶדֶת בַּיִת]]) Ez Eze 47:2, Eze 47:2. With [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc. [[חוּחָה]], after a vb. of motion Ex 12:46 [[חוּחָה]]…[[מִן־הַבַּיִת ]], Pr 5:16, 2Ch 29:16, 2Ch 33:15 [[חוּחָה לָעִיר]] outside of the city, Nu 35:4 [[מִקִּיר הָעִיר]] [[וׇחוּחָה]] from the wall of the city and outwards; = on the outside, without 1Ki 6:6, Is 33:7 [[חָֽעֲקוּ]] [[חוּחָה]] cry without, 2Ch 24:8: so [[הַחוּחָה]] Ge 15:5 ´[[וַיּוֹחֵא אׂתוֹ הח]] and brought him outside, Ge 19:17, Ge 24:29, Jos 2:19 +, 1Ki 8:8 [[לאׁ יֵרָאוּ הַחוּחָה]] were not seen towards the outside, De 25:5 [[לאׁ תִהְיֶה אֵשֶׁת]] [[הַמֵּת הַחוּחָה לְאִישׁ זׇר]]i.e. shall not be married into another family, cf. Ju Jdg 12:9 a.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: with preps.: a. † [[אל־החוץ]] towards the outside Ez Eze 41:9, † Eze 34:21 pleon. [[אל־החוחה]]. b. [[בחוץ]] Ge 9:22 outside (opp. [[בְּתוֹח אָהֳלֽה]] v:Ge 9:21), Ge 24:31 [[לָמָּה תַעֲמׂד בַּחוץ]], De 24:11, Ex 21:19 [[אם יקום והתהלך בחוץ]] (after leaving a sick couch), 2Ki 10:24, Ps 31:12, Ez Eze 7:15 (opp. [[מִבַּיִת]]), Ho 7:1 +. c. † [[לחוץ]] Ps 41:7 [[יחא לחוץ]]; = on the outside Ez Eze 41:17, Eze 42:7, † [[לַחוּחָה]] 2Ch 32:5 towards the outside. d. [[מִחוּץ]] on ([[מִן]]

definitions.title: 3 c
definitions.body: ) the outside Ez Eze 40:19, Eze 46:2, [[מִבַיִת וּמִחוּץ]] within and without (of an ark, building, etc.) Ge 6:14, Ex 25:11 = Ex 37:2, 1Ki 7:9, De 32:25 [[מחוץ תְּשַׁכֶּל־חֶרֶב]] (opp. [[יּמֵחֲדָרִים]] [[אֵימָה]]), La 1:20 (cf. Ez Eze 7:15 supr. b); so [[מֵהַחוּץ]] † Ez Eze 41:25. [[מִחוּץ לְ]] on the outside of, Ge 19:16 [[וַיַּנִּיחֵהוּ מִחוּץ לָעִיר]], Ge 24:11, Ex 26:35, Ex 37:7, Ex 37:7, Le 8:17, Le 14:8, Nu 35:5, Jos 6:23, Je 21:4 +, even after a vb. of motion 1Ki 21:13 [[וַיּוֹחִיאוּהוּ מִחוּץ לְעִיר]], 2Ki 23:6, though in this case [[אל מחוץ ל]] is more common, Le 4:12, Le 4:21 [[אל מחוץ למחנה]], Le 6:4, Le 10:4, Le 14:40, Le 14:41 + oft. P, De 23:11. e. † [[מִחוּחָה]] Ez Eze 40:40 on the outside, [[מִחוּחָה לְ]] v:Eze 40:44. f. (late) † [[חוּץ מִן]] outside of, Ec 2:25 who can eat, and who enjoy, [[חוּץ מִמֶּנִּיִ]] outside of me, i.e. except me? (but rd. rather, with LXX SyrVer De Now al., [[חוּץ מִמֶּנּוּ]] apart from, without him, i.e. God). (So NH [[חוּץ מִן]] except, without, v. De:Ec 2:25. Cf. The Aram. syn. [[בַּר מִן]] except Ex 20:3 Targum; apart from, without Is 36:10 Targum; Syr. lbad men id.)

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: that which is outside the houses of a town, i.e. a street Is 51:23 [[כַּחוּץ לַעׂבְרִים]], Je 37:21 [[חוּץ הָאׂפִים]] the Bakers' street, Pr 1:20 [[כַּחוּץ]], (‖[[כָּֽרְחׂבוֹת]]: so Pr 7:12, Pr 22:13, Je 9:20); oft. in pl., as [[חוּחׂת אַשְׁקְלוׂן]] the streets of Ashkelon 2Sa 1:20, [[ירושׁלם]] ´[[ח]] Je 5:1, Je 7:17, Je 7:34 + oft. Jer., 1Ki 20:34 [[וְחֻחוֹת תָּשִׂים־לְךָ בְּדַמֶּשֶׂק]] and streets (i.e. bazaars) shalt thou make thee in D., as my father made in Samaria (a concession involving the right of trading), Am 5:16, Is 15:3, Is 24:11 (as scene of mourning), Is 5:25, Je 51:4, Ez Eze 11:6, Eze 28:23 ( as filled with corpses of slain), [[בְּראׂשׁ כָּל־חוּחוֹת]] i.e. in conspicuous places, Na 3:10, La 2:19, La 4:1, Is 51:20, [[טִיט חוּחוֹת]] mire of streets Zec 10:5 (trampled on by warriors), in simile, of foes trodden under foot, Ps 18:43, Mic 7:10 ( so ´[[כְּחׂמֶר ח]] Is 10:6), metaph. of cheapness and abundance Zec 9:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: more gen., that which is outside enclosed cities, the open country, Job 18:17 [[וְלאׂ]] [[שֵׁם לוֹ עַל־פְּנֵי־חוּץ]] (v. De), cf. Pr 24:27; in the pl. Job 5:10 [[וְשׁׂלֵחַ מַיִם עַל פְנֵי חוּחוֹת]], Pr 8:26, Ps 144:13 (as place where flocks abound).
